entities.name: scrimgeour
entities.description: Scrimgeour is introduced as a limping person who intrudes on Harry's party. He looks at the Snitch cake and says 'Many happy returns' to Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as looking much older than before, scraggy and grim. Scrimgeour addresses him saying 'Many happy returns'.

entities.name: ronald weasley
entities.description: Ron is addressed by Scrimgeour to lead the way to a private room.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione is also addressed by Scrimgeour to join him in a private conversation.

entities.name: mr. weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is described as looking nervous and exchanges a worried look with Mrs. Weasley.

entities.name: mrs. weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley exchanges a worried look with Mr. Weasley.

relationships.description: Scrimgeour addresses Harry saying 'Many happy returns'.
Scrimgeour asks Ron to lead the way to a private room.
Scrimgeour invites Hermione to join him in a private conversation.
Mr. Weasley accommodates Scrimgeour by offering the sitting room for their private conversation.
